modName: better teeth for human races se - DELETED
summary: a high res texture replacer for the race mouthhuman texture with optional optimized mouthhuman mesh and dimmed version for enb/hdr user
descriptionHtml:
high res texture replacer for race mouthhuman texture if you are not happy with yours. small mod but for me an important detail i like to
share with you.
teeth are changed (texture and normal map) and scaled to fit to the vanilla meshes and many custom human races (tested with
ningheim and lunari race) and look more natural. as far as i tested i
can confirm that it works with vampires if no other mod interferes. i
added a dimmed version for enb/hdr users if standard teeth texture
appears too shiny.

this is a texture replacer only - no 3D mesh related stuff inside except the optional vanilla mesh replacer with
subtle mesh changes to be 100% compatible.
it is not a 3D mod. some 3D mod exist but i like it simple without a risk of compatibilty issues.
so i decided to offer this simple but fully compatible version with
optimized 3D like normal map.

i added an optimized mouthhuman mesh for download. i use it for my characters and npc. vertices are
slightly larger scaled and replaced to
fit better with many face meshes but not all. put it in the standard folder and replace vanilla mesh.
should work with many human races using the standard mesh. in case
a race mod includes its own mouthhuman mesh you must replace it in the
race related folder. see tagged screenshots for possible result.
no guarantee that this works with all races (i encountered some gliches
using expressions with lunari) but it should almost. please try and give
me feedback if you encounter problems. in case of problem replace with your backup mesh.

installation
-------------
for more convenience the replacer files with folder structure for
replacement of the standard vanilla mouthhuman files are included.
if you like to use it for your custom races with deviating file structure
(ningheim race already included) you have to replace the files with the
same name in the appropriate custom race folder.Â 

thanks to the gimp and nifscope developers, all modders for their beautiful
races, bethesda and nexusmods.com providing this platform
author: xrayy
